name: DRESSUPGAMER
description:
Before deciding to fully concentrate on learning Unity and coding in Unity using C# scripting... I made this experiment in Ren'py to thank my patrons, which are mostly streamers! This is the reason why you will dressup a gamer in this game! Choose the coolest microphone, headset, consolle or controller, pick your favourite  haircolour  and mouse, put a funny emote in your face , then press S and show me the result on 

twitter: https://twitter.com/Elena_Ceccotti

Can't wait to see your creations!!!!

Wanna be part of the community? Support my upcoming games?

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/CIPPLE?fan_landing=true

From April 2020, only patrons will also receive NOT custum assets which have my own assets as base and their name on credits! I won't be able to produce a game/ monthly, as for now, so tiers would still be custum sketches (coloured or not according to the type of tier you choose) but will randomly add some assets for free for every patron to use for personal -not commercial - usage)😊
